sql.where:
${reqDTO.where_column} = #{reqDTO.where_value}
and ttq.teacherQnaTitle like concat('%', #{pageDTO.search_word}, '%')
and ttq.teacherQnaQContent like concat('%', #{pageDTO.search_word}, '%')
and ttq.questionMemberName like concat('%', #{pageDTO.search_word}, '%')
and ttq.answerMemberName like concat('%', #{pageDTO.search_word}, '%')

mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_teacher_qna as ttq inner join tbl_member as tmq on ttq.teacherQnaQMemberId = tmq.memberId inner join tbl_member as tma on ttq.teacherQnaAMemberId = tma.memberId

select ttq.teacherQnaIdx as teacherQnaIdx, ttq.teacherQnaTitle as teacherQnaTitle, ttq.teacherQnaQContent as teacherQnaQContent, ttq.teacherQnaCreatedAt as teacherQnaCreatedAt ttq.teacherQnaQMemberId as teacherQnaQMemberId, tmq.memberName AS questionMemberName, tmq.memberProfileImg AS questionMemberProfileImg, ttq.teacherQnaAContent as teacherQnaAContent, ttq.teacherQnaAnsweredAt as teacherQnaAnsweredAt ttq.teacherQnaAMemberId, tma.memberName AS answerMemberName, tma.memberProfileImg AS answerMemberProfileImg, ttq.teacherQnaPwd as teacherQnaPwd from tbl_teacher_qna as ttq inner join tbl_member as tmq on ttq.teacherQnaQMemberId = tmq.memberId inner join tbl_member as tma on ttq.teacherQnaAMemberId = tma.memberId
order by ${pageDTO.sort_by} ${pageDTO.sort_direction} limit #{pageDTO.page_skip_count}, #{pageDTO.page_size}

select ttq.teacherQnaIdx as teacherQnaIdx, ttq.teacherQnaTitle as teacherQnaTitle, ttq.teacherQnaQContent as teacherQnaQContent, ttq.teacherQnaCreatedAt as teacherQnaCreatedAt ttq.teacherQnaQMemberId as teacherQnaQMemberId, tmq.memberName AS questionMemberName, tmq.memberProfileImg AS questionMemberProfileImg, ttq.teacherQnaAContent as teacherQnaAContent, ttq.teacherQnaAnsweredAt as teacherQnaAnsweredAt ttq.teacherQnaAMemberId, tma.memberName AS answerMemberName, tma.memberProfileImg AS answerMemberProfileImg, ttq.teacherQnaPwd as teacherQnaPwd from tbl_teacher_qna as ttq inner join tbl_member as tmq on ttq.teacherQnaQMemberId = tmq.memberId inner join tbl_member as tma on ttq.teacherQnaAMemberId = tma.memberId where ttq.teacherQnaIdx = #{teacherQnaIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_teacher_qna (teacherQnaTitle, teacherQnaQContent, teacherQnaQMemberId, teacherQnaAMemberId, teacherQnaPwd) values (#{teacherQnaTitle}, #{teacherQnaQContent}, #{teacherQnaQMemberId}, #{teacherQnaAMemberId}, #{teacherQnaPwd})
